attributes.action: Close down the failing Royal Mail and completely privatise the system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If Royal Mail was closed down completely, this would force the alternative post companies to compete for a share of the market.  This would therefore create a much better service.  

This request comes in the light of the fact that some companies in the Watford area have now not have any postal deliveries for over one week.  This is unacceptable.  

As Royal Mail no longer appear to offer a postal service (in Watford) what is the point of having them?
